scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js
scripts.deploy: npm run export && aws s3 sync build/ s3://your-bucket-name --delete
scripts.generate-sitemap: node -e "const { generateSitemap } = require('./src/utils/sitemapGenerator.js'); const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('public/sitemap.xml', generateSitemap());"
scripts.build-with-sitemap: npm run generate-sitemap && npm run build
